snippet: The Chesapeake Energy Corporation has announced three deals that will raise $2.6 billion in cash for the natural gas giant.
abstract: The Chesapeake Energy Corporation has announced three deals that will raise $2.6 billion in cash for the natural gas giant.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Energy Sector Deals Keep Coming, as Chesapeake Strikes 3
